title: OpenMPI: Fortran compiler detection is wrong?
body:

==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Error: InstallError: OpenMPI requires both C and Fortran compilers!
InstallError: InstallError: OpenMPI requires both C and Fortran compilers!

/home/ben/Work/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/openmpi/package.py:286, in die_without_fortran:
     4             # avoid delayed build errors in dependents.
     5             if (self.compiler.f77 is None) or (self.compiler.fc is None):
     6                 raise InstallError(
  >> 7                     'OpenMPI requires both C and Fortran compilers!'
     8                 )

See build log for details:
  /home/ben/Work/spack/var/spack/stage/openmpi-3.0.0-txgf5bbweja2eybc2bnl5zrcaxlsonvp/openmpi-3.0.0/spack-build.out

Shouldn't that be: 
            if (self.compiler.f77 is None) and (self.compiler.fc is None):

when I changed the script, it built just fine.
